name: What'sHappeninginDanbury
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
What is happening this week in Danbury, Connecticut. Arts and Cultural events from the Art galleries, Concert halls, Museums, and Theaters. Compiled by The City of Danbury Cultural Commission. 

To Begin the app, ask Alexa: "Play my Flash Briefing.". 

EXPECTATION: Alexa will answer Here is your Flash Briefing... then she will read the Calendar events.

To move to the next day or another news story, say Alexa: "Next". 

EXPECTATION: There are up to 5 entries available.

The news will update weekly, around Wednesday night. 

The playback order of the DanburyArts Calendar during the Flash Briefing is set in the Alexa app.

The City of Danbury Calendar from DanburyArts.com is copied to a blog which has an RSS feed. 
The RSS feed from the Blogger page should be read by the Alexa text to speech service.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
